double_crochet x10 ch1 and turn row 109 treble_crochet in each st across change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 110 treble_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 111 treble_crochet in permission you may sell finished items as long as credit is given to the designers border creating the sides make sure the right side of your blanket is facing you turn it so you can work down one of the sides join your yarn in the right hand corner see photo one ch1 does not count as a st double_crochet in the same place ch2 and double_crochet roughly two stitches away from your first double_crochet the easiest way to do this is let the ch2 lie across the side of your blanket and place your double_crochet where it finishes see photo two continue until you have reached the left hand corner ch1 and turn treble_crochet in the first double_crochet then treble_crochet x2 in each ch2 space skipping the double_crochet sts treble_crochet in the last double_crochet ch1 and turn see photo three treble_crochet in each st across fasten_off and repeat for the other side of the blanket round 1 join your yarn in any stitch along the top of your blanket ch1 does not count as a st double_crochet in each st until the corner you will need to place stitches into the side of the treble_crochet row from creating the sides see photo four double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in the corner and continue down the side continue until all 4 corners have been created then double_crochet in the remaining sts of the top row join in the first double_crochet with a slip_stitch and fasten_off round 2 join a new colour chain 1 does not count as a st half_double_crochet in each st placing 3 half_double_crochet in the corner ch2 spaces slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet created and fasten off ©2020 lyndas craft room & the wee house of crochet for the crochet sanctuary this pattern should not be copied sold or posted online without permission you may sell finished items as long as credit is given to the designers round 3 join a new colour a in any stitch ch4 and remove your hook join a second new colour b in the stitch to the left of yarn a ch4 and remove your hook see photo five *pick up yarn a and double_crochet in the next st working in front of the chains of yarn b ch4 and remove your hook see photo six repeat from * alternating yarns a and b until you have worked around the blanket see photo
